code: import React,{useState}from"react";import axios from"axios";import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const ApplyLeave=()=>{const[formData,setFormData]=useState({start_date:"",end_date:"",reason:""});const[message,setMessage]=useState("");const handleChange=e=>{setFormData({...formData,[e.target.name]:e.target.value});};const handleSubmit=async e=>{e.preventDefault();try{const token=localStorage.getItem("token");await axios.post("http://127.0.0.1:8000/api/leave/apply/",formData,{headers:{Authorization:`Bearer ${token}`}});setMessage("Leave request submitted successfully!");setFormData({start_date:"",end_date:"",reason:""});}catch(error){console.error("Error applying for leave",error);setMessage("Failed to submit leave request.");}};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{children:"Apply for Leave"}),message&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:message}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("form",{onSubmit:handleSubmit,children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("label",{children:"Start Date:"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"date",name:"start_date",value:formData.start_date,onChange:handleChange,required:true}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("label",{children:"End Date:"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"date",name:"end_date",value:formData.end_date,onChange:handleChange,required:true}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("label",{children:"Reason:"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("textarea",{name:"reason",value:formData.reason,onChange:handleChange,required:true}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{type:"submit",children:"Submit"})]})]});};export default ApplyLeave;
